login.title: Sign in to GOV⁠.⁠UK Forms
login.invitationDescription: Sign in to accept ${inviterName}'s invitation to join ${companyName} on ${clientName}.
login.invalid-email-format: Enter your email address in the correct format
login.custom-script-error-code: Something went wrong, please try again later
login.authentication-failure: We are sorry, something went wrong when attempting to sign in
login.ip-blocked: We have detected suspicious sign in behaviour and further attempts will be blocked. Please contact the GOV⁠.⁠UK Forms team.
login.user-blocked: Your account has been blocked after multiple consecutive attempts to sign in.
login.same-user-login: Too many attempts to sign in. Please try again later.
login.no-username: Enter your username or email address
